availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Malinda Catherine Nall Bennett (Daviess County, KY, domestic lady )

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, domestic lady. Muhlenberg County, Kentucky native. Daughter of William Nall and Sarah Nall. Married to William P. Bennett in McLean County, Kentucky, on September 25, 1859. Stepmother of James C. Bennett and J. A. Bennett. Student in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Household owned eight enslaved persons in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Performed domestic duty in Daviess County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 232A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 127.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 1, p. 696.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994047, McLean County Marriages, p. 241-42.
"Malinda Catherine Nall Bennett (1835-1876)," Find A Grave, Memorial #85206183, accessed August 25, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/85206183.
